text: Cho Jin-ho (August 2, 1973 – October 10, 2017) was a South Korean football player. He was born in Daegu, South Korea. He played as a midfielder or striker for the South Korea national team. Cho also played for Pohang Steelers and Seongnam. He served as manager for Daejeon Citizen, Sangju Sangmu and for Busan IPark. Cho died of a heart attack on October 10, 2017 in Busan, South Korea at the age of 44.Pro football club coach dies of heart attack ==International goals== :Results list South Korea's goal tally first. title: Cho Jin-ho
